A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film\, while visually stunning\, lacks substance and meaningful character development. The storytelling is atrocious\, and many elements of the film contradict existing star wars cannon. The talented actors/actresses in this film were wasted due to shoddy writing\, as the director seems to value style over substance. \n\nIt truly baffles me that people can enjoy this film and I genuinely don't understand why this film is rated so highly by 'critics'.
